summary: A portrait of the life, culture and food surrounding the lovers of Polka music. The title is taken from an old Polka standard. Stars of the Polka world are highlighted.
cast: Dick Pillar|Walter Szczypula|Jimmy Sturr & His Orchestra|The Marion Lush Orchestra|Marv Herzog|Janice E. title: In Heaven There Is No Beer?
